GK19bahcar4u:4: vipule 'pi pṛthupratimo danta iva gaṇādhipasya mukhe // 4.2 //
GK19bahcar4u:17_0: teṣu caivamutpadyamāneṣu krameṇodapādi hūṇahariṇakesarī sindhurājajvaro gūrjaraprajāgaro
GK19bahcar4u:18: yo rājyāṅgasaṅgīnyabhiṣicyamāna eva malānīva mumoca dhanāni /
GK19bahcar4u:19: yaḥ parakīyenāpi kātaravallabhena raṇamukhe tṛṇeneva dhṛtenālajjata jīvitena /
GK19bahcar4u:20: yaḥ karadhṛtadhautāsipratibimbitenātmanāpyadūyata samitiṣu sahāyena ripūṇāṃ puraḥ pradhaneṣu dhanuṣāpi namatā yo mānī mānasenākhidyata /
GK19bahcar4u:22: yaśca sarvāsu dikṣu samīkṛtataṭāvaṭaviṭapāṭavītarutṛṇagulmavalmīkagirigahanairdaṇḍayātrāpathaiḥ pṛthubhirbhṛtyopayogāya vyabhajateva vasudhāṃ bahudhā /
GK19bahcar4u:23: yaṃ cālabdhayuddhadohadamātmoyo 'pi sakalaripusamutsārakaḥ parakīya iva tatāpa pratāpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:30: yasya cāsanneṣu bhṛtyaratneṣu pratibimbateva tulyarūpā sa ptalakṣyata lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:36_0: yaśca vairamupāyanaṃ vigrahamanugrahaṃ samarāgamaṃ mahotsavaṃ śatruṃ nidhidarśanamaribāhulyamabhyudayamāhavāhvānaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:44: tasya ca janmāntare 'pi satī pārvatīva śaṅkarasya,
GK19bahcar4u:94: yaśomatī nāma mahādevī prāṇānāṃ praṇayasya visrambhasya dhramasya sukhasya ca bhūmirabhūt /
GK19bahcar4u:96: nisargata eva ca sa nṛpatirādityabhakto babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:97_0: pratidinamudaye dinakṛtaḥ snātaḥ sitadukūladhārī dhavalakarpaṭaprāvṛtaśirāḥ prāṅmukhaḥ
GK19bahcar4u:97_1: kṣitau jānubyāṃ sthitvā kuṅkumapaṅkānulipte maṇḍalake pavitrapajharāgapātrīnihitena
GK19bahcar4u:98: ajapacca japyaṃ sucaritaḥ pratyuṣasi madhyandine dinānte cāpatyahetoḥ prādhvaṃ prayatena manasā jañjapūko mantramādityahṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:100: yataḥ sarājā kadācid grīṣmasamaye yadṛcchayā sitakarakarasitasudhādhavalasya harmyasya pṛṣṭe suṣvāpa /
GK19bahcar4u:101: vāmapārśve cāsya dvitīyaśayane devī yaśomatī śiśye /

GK19bahcar4u:106_3: devī yaśomatī sahasaiva “āryaputra! paritrāyasva paritrāyasva' iti bhāṣamāṇā bhūṣaṇaraveṇa
GK19bahcar4u:107: atha tena sarvasyāmapi pṛthivyāmaśrutapūrveṇa kimuta devīmukhe paritrāyasveti dhvaninā dagdha iva śravaṇayorekapada eva nidrāṃ tatyāja rājā /
GK19bahcar4u:108: śirobhāgācca kopakampamānadakṣiṇakarākṛṣṭena karṇotpaleneva nirgacchatācchadhāreṇa dhautāsinā sīmantayanniva niśām,
GK19bahcar4u:110: karavikṣepavegagalitena hṛdayeneva bhayanimittānveṣiṇā bhramatā dikṣu kanakavalayena virājamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:112: puraḥ patitenāsidhārāgocaragatena śaśimayūkhakhaṇḍeneva khaṇḍitena hāreṇa rājamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:114: baddhāndhakārayā tripatākayā bhrukuṭyā punariva triyāmāṃ parivartayan “devi! na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam' ityabhidadhāno vegenotpapāta /
GK19bahcar4u:115: sarvāsu ca dikṣu vikṣiptacakṣuryadā nādrākṣītkiñcidapi tadā papraccha tāṃ bhayakāraṇam /

GK19bahcar4u:131: tau ca me vilapantyāḥ śastreṇodaraṃ vidārya praveṣṭumārabdhau /
GK19bahcar4u:134: etasminneva ca kālakrame rājalakṣmyāḥ prathamālāpaḥ prathayanniva svapnaphalamupatoraṇaṃ rarāṇa prabhātaśaṅkhaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:138_0: puruṣaśca vallabhaturaṅgamandurāmandire mandamandaṃ suptotthitaḥ saptīnāṃ kṛtamadhuraheṣāravāṇāṃ
GK19bahcar4u:152: tataḥ samatikrānte kasmiṃścitkālāṃśe devyāṃ ca yaśomatyāṃ devo rājyavardhanaḥ prathamameva saṃbabhūva garbhe /
GK19bahcar4u:153: garbhasthitasyaiva ca yasya yaśaseva pāṇḍutāmādata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:156: śanaiḥ śanairupacīyamānagarbhamarālasā ca gurubhirvāritāpi vandanāya kayamapi sakhībhirhastāvalambenānīyata /
GK19bahcar4u:160: maṇibhittipātinīṣu nijapratimāsvapi hastāvalambanalobhena prasārayāmāsa karakamalam, kimuta sakhīṣu /
GK19bahcar4u:163: āstāṃ nūpurabhārakheditaṃ caraṇayugalaṃ manasāpi nodasahata saudhamāroḍhum /
GK19bahcar4u:167: divasaṃ cādhomukhī stanapṛṣṭhasaṃkrāntenāpatyadarśanautsukyādantaḥ praviṣṭeneva mukhakamalenaivaṃ prīyamāṇā dadarśa garbham /
GK19bahcar4u:168: udare tanayena hṛdaye ca bharvā tiṣṭhatā dviguṇitāmiva lakṣmīmuvāha /
GK19bahcar4u:169: sakhyutsaṅgamuktaśarīrā ca śarīraparicārikāṇāmaṅkeṣu sapatnīnāṃ tu śiraḥsu pādau cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:170: avatīrṇe ca daśame māsi sarvorvībhṛtpakṣapātāya vajraparamāṇubiriva nirmitam,
GK19bahcar4u:173: yasmiṃśca jāte jātapramodā nṛtyamayya ivājāyanta prajāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:175_1: stambitatāmarase vikasitacātakacetasi mūkamānasaukasi nabhasi māsi devyā devakyā
GK19bahcar4u:175_2: iva cakrapāṇiryaśomatyā hṛdaye garbhe ca samameva saṃbabhūva harṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:177: garbhārambheṇa śyāmāyamānacārucūcukacūliko cakravartinaḥ pātuṃ mudritāviva payodharakalaśau babhāroraḥsthaleva /
GK19bahcar4u:180: marndaṃ-mandaṃ saṃcarantyā nirmalamaṇikuṭṭimanimagnapratibimbanibhena gṛhīta pādapallavā pūrvasevāmivārebhe pṛtivyasyāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:182: kṣapāsu saudhaśikharāgragatāyā garbhonmāthamaktāṃśuke stanamaṇḍale saṃkrāntamuḍupatimaṇḍalamupari garbhasya śvetātapatramiva kenāpi dhāryamāṇamadṛśyata /
GK19bahcar4u:187: api ca caturṇāmapi mahārṇavānāmekīkṛtenāmbhasā snātuṃ vāñchā babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:190: saṃnihiteṣvapi maṇidarpaṇeṣu mukhamutkhāte khaḍāgapaṭṭe vīkṣituṃ vyasanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:195: ātmocitasthānaniṣaṇṇāśca mahānto vividhauṣadhidharā bhiṣajo bhūdharā iva bhuvo dhṛtiṃ cakruḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:196: payonidhīnāṃ hṛdayānīva lakṣmyā sahāgatāni grīvāsūtragranthiṣu praśastaratnānyabadhyatta /

GK19bahcar4u:198: nirgatya ca saṃbhramaṃ yaśovatyāḥ svayameva hṛdayanirviśeṣā dhātryāḥ sutā supātreti nāmnā rājñaḥ pādayornipatya “deva /
GK19bahcar4u:199: diṣṭyā vardhase dvitīyasutajanmanā' iti vyāharantī pūrṇapātraṃ jahāra /

GK19bahcar4u:203_0: sakalagaṇakamadhye mahito hitaśca trikālajñānabhāgbhojakastārako nāma gaṇakaḥ samupasṛtya
GK19bahcar4u:204: arvāktato 'sminnantarāle punarevaṃvidhe yoge cakravarttijanane nājani jagati kaścidaparaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:205_0: saptānāṃ cakravartināmagraṇariścakravarticihnānāṃ mahāratnānāṃ ca bhājanaṃ saptānāṃ
GK19bahcar4u:205_1: sāgarāṇāṃ pālayitā saptatantūnāṃ sarveṣāṃ pravartayitā saptasaptisamaḥ suto 'yaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:206: atrāntare svayamevānādmātā api tāramadhuraṃ śahkhā viresuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:212: vavau cācirāccakrāyudhamutsṛjantyā lakṣmyā niśvāsa iva surāmodasurabhirdivyānilaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:216: prahatamaṅgalatūryapratiśabdanibhena dikṣu dikpālairapi pramoda dakriyatena diṣṭavṛddhikalakalaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:217: tatkṣaṇa eva ca śuklavāsaso brahnamukhāḥ kṛtayugaprajāpatayaiva prajāvṛddheye samupatasthire dvijātayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:220: pralambaśmaśrujālajaṭilānanāni bahalamalapaṅkakalaṅkakālakāyāni naśyataḥ kalikālasya bāndhavakulānīvākulānyadhāvanta muktāni bandhanavṛndāni /

GK19bahcar4u:243: sanandanavana iva pārijātakāmodaiḥ sanīhāra iva karpūrareṇubhiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:299: kāścitkaṇṭhanihitakāñcanakāñcīguṇāñcitakañcukivikārākuñcitabruvaḥ kāmavāgurā iva prasāritabāhupāśā rājamahiṣyaḥ prārabdhanṛttā vilesuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:300: sarvataśca nṛtyataḥ streṇasya galadabhiḥ pādālaktakairaruṇitā rāgamayīva śuśoṇa kṣoṇī /
GK19bahcar4u:304: cañcalānāṃ cakṣuṣāmaṃ śubhiḥ kṛṣṇasāramayā ivāsan vāsarāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:307: utkṣiptairhastakisalayaiḥ kamalinīmayya iva babhāsire sṛṣṭayaḥ māṇikyendrāyudhānāmarciṣā cārṣipatramayā iva cakāśire ravimarīcayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:308: raṇatāmābharaṇagaṇānāṃ pratiśabdakaiḥ kiṅkiṇīmayya iva śiśiñjire diśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:314: diśi diśi kuberakoṣā ivālupyanta lokena draviṇarāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:330: ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣamavatarati ca rājyavardhane devī yaśomatī garbheṇādhatta nārāyaṇamūrtiriva vasudhāṃ devīṃ rājyaśriyam /
GK19bahcar4u:339: yayā dvayoḥ sutayorapi stanayorivaikāvalīlatayā nitarāmarājata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:340: arimanneva tu kāle devyā yaśomatyā bhrātā sutamaṣṭavarṣadeśīyamudbhūyamānakuṭilakākapakṣakaśikhaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaparaśuhuṅkārāgnidhūmalekhānubaddhamūrdhānaṃ makaradhvajamiva punarjātam,
GK19bahcar4u:341: ekenendranīlakuṇḍalāśuśyāmalitena śarīrārdhenetareṇa ca trikaṇṭakamuktāphalālokadhavalitena saṃpṛttāvatāramiva hariharayordarśayantam,
GK19bahcar4u:344: śaiśave 'pi savāṣṭambhaṃ bījamiva voryadramasya bhaṇḍināmānamanucaraṃ kumārayorarpitavān /
GK19bahcar4u:345: avanipatestu tasyopari putrayostṛtīyasya netrayoriveśvarasya tulyaṃ darśanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:346: rājaputrāvapi sakalajīvalokahṛdayānādadāyinī tena prakṛtidakṣiṇena madhumādhavāviva malayamārutenopetau nitarāṃ rejatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:347: krameṇacāpareṇeva bhrātrā prajānandena saha vardhamānau yauvanamavateratuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:348: sthirorustambhau ca pṛthuprakoṣṭhau dīrghabhujārgalau vikaṭoraḥkavāṭau prāṃśuśālābhirāmau mahānagarasaṃniveśāviva sarvalokāśrayakṣamau babhūvatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:378_1: iti harṣa iti sarvasyāmeva pṛthivyāmāvirbhūtaśabdaprādurbhāvau svalpīyasaiva kālena
GK19bahcar4u:379: ekadā ca tāvāhūya bhuktavānabhyantaragataḥ pitā sasnehamavādīt--“vatsau! prathamaṃ rājyāṅgaṃ,
GK19bahcar4u:381: prāyeṇa paramāṇava iva samavāyeṣvanuguṇībhūya dravyaṃ kurvanti pārthivaṃ kṣudrāḥ krīḍārasena nartayantatau mayūratāṃ nayanti bāliśāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:385: cātakā iva tṛṣṇāvanto na śakyante grahītumakulīnāḥ mānase mīnamiva sphurantamevābhiprāyaṃ gṛhṇanti jālikāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:388_0: yataḥ sarvairebhirdeṣābhiṣaṅgairasaṃgatau babhudhaipadhābhiḥ parīkṣitau śucī vinītau
GK19bahcar4u:388_1: vikrāntāvabhirūpau mālavarājaputrau bhrātarau bujāviva me śarīrādavyatiriktau kumāraguptamādhavaguptanāmānāvasmābhirbhavatoranucaratvārthamimau nirdiṣṭau /
GK19bahcar4u:391: na cirād dvāradeśanihitalocanau rājyavardhanaharṣau pratīhāreṇa saha praviśantam,
GK19bahcar4u:392: agrato jyeṣṭhamaṣṭādaśavarṣavayasaṃ nātyuccaṃ nātikharvamatigurubhiḥ padanyāsairanekanarapatisaṃcaraṇacalāṃ niścalīkurvāṇamivorvīm,
GK19bahcar4u:399: acapalāstamitatārakeṇādhomukhena cakṣuṣā śikṣayantamiva lakṣmīlābhottānitamukhāni paṅkajavanāni vinayam,
GK19bahcar4u:407: pṛṣṭhatastasya kanīyāṃsamatiprāṃśutayā gauratayā ca manaḥ śilāśelamiva saṃcarantam,
GK19bahcar4u:408: anulbaṇamālatīkusumaśekharanibhena nirjigamiṣatā guruṇa śirasi cumbitamiva yaśasā,
GK19bahcar4u:410: atidhīratayā hṛdayanihitā svāmibhaktimiva niścalāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ dhārayantam,
GK19bahcar4u:411: acchācchacandanarasānulepanaśītalaṃ saṃnihitahāropadhānaṃ vakṣaḥsthalamanantasāmantasaṃkrānti śrāntāyāḥ śriyo viśālaṃ śaśimaṇiśilāpaṭṭaśayanamiva bibrāṇam,
GK19bahcar4u:412_0: cakṣuḥ kuraṅgakairghoṇāvaṃśaṃ varāhauḥ skandhapīṭhaṃ mahiṣaiḥ prakoṣṭhabandhaṃ vyāghraiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:413: praviśya ca tau dūrādeva caturbhirahgairuttamāṅgena ca gāṃ spṛśantau namaścakratuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:415: muhūrtaṃ ca sthitvā bhūpatirādideśa tau--“adyaprabhṛti bhavadbhyāṃ kumārāvanuvartanīyau' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:416: “yathājñāpayati devaḥ' iti medinīdo lāyamānamaulibhyāmutthāya rājyavradhanaharṣau praṇematuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:418: tataścārabhya kṣaṇamapi nimeṣonmeṣāviva cakṣurgocarādanapayāntāvucchvāsaniḥśvāsāviva naktandivamabhimukhasthitau bhujāviva satatapārśvavartinau kumārayostau babhūvatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:419: atha rājyaśrīrapi nṛttagītādiṣu vidagdhāsu sakhīṣu sakalāsu kalāsu ca pratidivasamupacīyamānaparicayā śanaiḥ śanairavardhata /
GK19bahcar4u:421: nipeturekasyāṃ tasyāṃ śarā iva lakṣyabhuvi bhūbhujāṃ sarveṣāṃ dṛṣaśṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:423: kadācittu rājāntaḥpuraprasādasthito bāhyakakṣyāvasthitena puruṣeṇa svaprastāvāgatāṃ gīyamānāmāryāmaśṛṇot--
GK19bahcar4u:426: tāṃ ca śrutvā pārśvasthitāṃ mahādevīmutsāritaparijano jagāda--“devi! taruṇībhūtā vatsā rājyaśrīḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:427: etadīyā guṇavatteva kṣaṇamapi hṛdayānnāpayāti me cintā /
GK19bahcar4u:428: yauvanārambha eva ca kanyakānābhindhanībhavanti pitaraḥ saṃtāpānalasya /
GK19bahcar4u:430: kenāpi kṛtā dharmyā nābhimatā me sthitireyaṃ yadaṅgasaṃbhūtānyaṅkalālitānyaparityājyānyapatyakānyakāṇḍa evāgatyāsaṃstutairnīyante /
GK19bahcar4u:432: seyaṃ sarvābhibhāvinī śokāgnedahiśaktiryadapatyatve samāne 'pi jātāyāṃ duhitari dūyante santaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:433: etadrathaṃ janmakāla eva kanyakābhyaḥ prayacchanti salilamaśrubiḥ sādhavaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:435: ko hi nāma saheta sacetano virahamapatyānām /
GK19bahcar4u:436: yathā yathā samāpatanti dūtā varāṇāṃ varākī lajjamāneva cintā tathā tathā nitarāṃ praviśati mehṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:440: dharaṇīdharāṇāṃ ca mūrdhni sthito māheśvarā pādanyāsa iva sakalabhuvananamaskṛto maukharo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:441: tatrāpi tilakabhūtasyāvantivarmaṇaḥ sūnuragrajo grahavarmā nāma grahapatiriva gāṃ gataḥ pituranyūno guṇairenāṃ prārthayate /
GK19bahcar4u:442_0: yadi bhavatyā api matiranumanyate tatastasmai dātumicchāmi' ityuktavati bhartari
GK19bahcar4u:445: yathā neyaṃ yāvajjavīvamāvayorārgitāṃ prati padyate tathāryaputra eva jānāti' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:446: rājā tu jātaniścayo duhitṛdānaṃ prati samāhūya sutāvapi viditārthāvakārṣīt /
GK19bahcar4u:447: śobhate ca divase grahavarmaṇā kanyāṃ prārthayituṃ preṣitasya pūrvāgatasyaiva pradhānadūtapuruṣasya kare sarvarājakulasamakṣaṃ duhitṛdānalalamapātayat /
GK19bahcar4u:448: jātamudi kṛtārthe gate ca tasminnāsanneṣu ca vivāhadivaseṣūddāmadīyamānatāmbūlapaṭavāsakusumaprasādhitasarvalokam,
GK19bahcar4u:467_0: āsūryodayācca praviṣṭābhiḥ satībhiḥ subhagābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ suveśābhiravidha vābhiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:469_3: stambhairujjvalaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cautsukyadaṃ ca maṅgalyaṃ cāsīdrājakulam /
GK19bahcar4u:470: devī tu yaśomatī vivāhotsavaparyākulahṛdayā hṛdayena bhartari,
GK19bahcar4u:479: bhūpatirapyuparyupari visarjitoṣṭravāmījanitajāmātṛjoṣaḥ satyapyājñāsaṃpādanadakṣe mukhekṣaṇapare parijane samaṃ putrābhyāṃ duhitṛsnehavivalavaḥ sarvaṃ svayamakarot /
GK19bahcar4u:480: evaṃ ca tasminnavidhavāmaya iva bhavati rājakule,
GK19bahcar4u:487: lakṣmīmaya iva vijṛmbhamāṇe mahotsave nidhāna iva sukhasya,
GK19bahcar4u:488: phala iva janmanaḥ pariṇāma iva puṇyasya,
GK19bahcar4u:499: atha mahāpratīhāraḥ praviśya nṛpasamīpam “deva! jāmāturantikāttāmbūladāyakaḥ pārijātakanāmā saṃptāptaḥ' ityabhidhāya svākāraṃ yuvānamadarśayat /
GK19bahcar4u:500: rājā tu taṃ dūrādeva jāmātṛbahumānāddarśitādaraḥ “bālaka! kaccitkuśalī grahavarmā?' iti papraccha /
GK19bahcar4u:501_0: asau tu samākarmitanarādhipadhvanirdhāvamānaḥ katicitpadānyupasṛtya prasārya ca bāhū
GK19bahcar4u:501_1: sevācaturaściraṃ vasuṃdharāyāṃ nirdhāya mūrdhānamutthāya “deva! kuśalau yathājñāpayasyarcayati
GK19bahcar4u:502: āgatajāmātṛnivedanāgataṃ ca taṃ jñātvā kṛtasatkāraṃ rājā “yāminyāḥ prathame yāme vivāhakālātyayakṛto yathā na bhavati doṣaḥ' iti saṃdiśya pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot /
GK19bahcar4u:503: atha sakalakamalavanalakṣmīṃ vadhūmukha iva saṃcārya samavasite vāsare,
GK19bahcar4u:506: saubhāgyadhvaja iva raktāṃ śukasukumāravapuṣi nabhasi sphurati saṃdhyārāge,
GK19bahcar4u:508: lagnasaṃpādanasajja ivojjihāne jyotirgaṇe vivāhamahgalakalaśa ivodayaśikhariṇā samutkṣipyamāṇe vardhamānadhavalacchāye tārādhipamaṇḍale,
GK19bahcar4u:511: calakarṇacāmarāṇāṃ cāmīkaramaya sarvopakaraṇānāṃ varṇakalambināṃ balināṃ ghaṇṭāṭāṅkāriṇāṃ kariṇāṃ ghaṭābhiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:513: nakṣatramālāmaṇḍitamukhīṃ kariṇariṃ niśākara iva paurandarīṃ diśamārūḍhaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:518: kusumasaurabhagarvabhrāntabhramarakulakalakalapralāpasubhagaḥ pārijāta iva jātaḥ śriyā saha punaravatārito medinīm,
GK19bahcar4u:519: navavadhūvadanāvalokanakutūhaleneva kṛṣyamāṇahṛdayaḥ patanniva mukhena pratyāsannalagno grahavarmā /
GK19bahcar4u:520: rājā tu tamupadvāramāgataṃ caraṇābhyāmeva rājacakrānugamyamānaḥ sasutaḥ pratyujjagāma /
GK19bahcar4u:521: avatīrṇaṃ ca taṃ kṛtanamaskāraṃ manmathamiva mādhavaḥ prasāritabhujo gāḍhamāliliṅga /
GK19bahcar4u:522: yathākramaṃ pariṣvaktarājyavardhanaharṣaṃ ca haste gṛhītvābhyantaraṃ ninye /
GK19bahcar4u:524_0: na cirācca gambhīranāmā nṛpateḥ praṇayī vidvāndvijanamā grahavarmāṇamuvāca--“tāta!
GK19bahcar4u:524_1: tvāṃ prāpya cirātkhalu rājyaśriyā ghaṭitau tejomayau sakalajagadgoyamānabudhakarṇānandakāriguṇagaṇau
GK19bahcar4u:525: prathamameva kaustubhamaṇiriva guṇaiḥ sthito 'si hṛdaye devasya /
GK19bahcar4u:526: idānīṃ tu śaśīva sirasā parameśvareṇāsi voḍhavyo jātaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:527: evaṃ vadatyeva tasminnṛpamupasṛtya mauhūrtikāḥ “deva! samāsīdati lagnavelā /
GK19bahcar4u:530: gaccha' iti gadito grahavarmā praviśyānta puraṃ jāmātṛdarśanakutūhalinīnāṃ strīṇāṃ patitāni locanasahasrāṇi vikacanīlakuvalayavanānīva laṅghayannāsasāda kautukagṛhadvāram /
GK19bahcar4u:533: aruṇāṃśukāvaguṇṭhitamukhīṃ prabātasaṃdhyāmiva svaprabhayā niṣprabhānpradīpakānkurvāṇām atisaukumāryaśaṅkiteneva yauvanena nātinirbharamupagūḍhām,
GK19bahcar4u:542: prabhālāvaṇyamadasaurabhamādhuryaiḥ kaustubhaśaśimadirāpārijātāmṛtaprabhavaiḥ sarvaratnaguṇairaparāṇiva surāsurasṣā ratnākareṇa kalpitāṃ śriyam,
GK19bahcar4u:543: snigdhena bālikālokena sitasiraṇamarakataprabhāharitaśādvalena kapolasthalītalena vinodayantīmiva hāriṇīṃ locanacchāyām,
GK19bahcar4u:544: adhomukhaṃ varakautukālokanākulaṃ muhurmuhuḥ kutamukhannamanaprayatnaṃ sakhījanaṃ hṛdayaṃ ca nirbhartsayantī vadhūmapaśyat /
GK19bahcar4u:545: praviśantameva taṃ hṛdayacauraṃ vadhvā samarpitaṃ jagrāha kandarpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:546: parihāsasmeramkhībiśca nārībhiḥ kautukagṛhe yadyatkāryate jāmatātā tattatsarvamatipeśalaṃ cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:547: kṛtapariṇayānurūpaveśaparigrahāṃ gṛhītvā kare vadhūṃ nirjagāma jagāma ca navasudhādhavalā nimantritāgataistuṣāraśailopatyakāmiva tryambakāmbikāvivāhāhūtairbhūbhṛdbhiḥ parivṛtām,
GK19bahcar4u:552: āruroha ca tāṃ divamiva sajyotsnaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar4u:553: samutsasarpa ca vellitāruṇaśikhāpallavasya śikhinaḥ kusumāyudha iva ratidvitīyo raktāśokasya samīpam /
GK19bahcar4u:554: hute ca hutabhuji pradakṣiṇāvartapravṛttābhirvadhūvadanavilokanakutūhalinībhiriva jvālābhireva saha pradakṣiṇaṃ babhrāma /
GK19bahcar4u:558: parisamāpitavaivāhikakriyākalāpastu jāmātā vadhvā smaṃ praṇanāma śvaśurau /
GK19bahcar4u:563_1: sākṣāllakṣmyevoddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkahastayā sanāthena sopadhānena svāstīrṇena śayanena śobhamānam,
GK19bahcar4u:564: śayanasirobhāgasthitena ca kṛtakumudaśobhena kusumāyudhasāhāyakāyāgatena śaśineva nidrākalaśena rājatena virājamānaṃ vāsagṛham /
GK19bahcar4u:565_0: tatra ca hrītāyā navavadhūkāyāḥ parāṅmukhaprasuptāyā maṇibhittidarpaṇeṣu mukhapratibimbāni
GK19bahcar4u:566: sthitvā ca śvaśurakule śīlenāmṛtamiva śvaśrūhṛdaye varṣannabhinavābhinavopacārairapunaruktānyānandamayāni daśa dināni,
GK19bahcar4u:567: dattvā ca rājadauvārikamiva rājakule raṇaraṇakaṃ yautakaniveditānīva śambalānyādāya hṛdayāni sarvalarokasya kathaṅkathamapi visarjito nṛpeṇa vadhvā saha svadeśamagamaditi /
GK19bahcar4u:568: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite cakravartijanmavarṇanaṃ nāma caturtha ucchvāsaḥ/
